## registry.getClass() function

Gets the class for the given name and type.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare function getClass<T>(type: string | Type<T>, name: string, opt_throwIfMissing?: boolean): (new (...p1: any[]) => T) | null;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  type | string \| [Type](./blockly.registry_namespace.type_class.md)<!-- -->&lt;T&gt; | The type of the plugin. (e.g. Field, Renderer) |
|  name | string | The plugin's name. (Ex. field\_angle, geras) |
|  opt\_throwIfMissing | boolean | _(Optional)_ Whether or not to throw an error if we are unable to find the plugin. |

**Returns:**

(new (...p1: any\[\]) =&gt; T) \| null

The class with the given name and type or null if none exists.
